name: Ingvar
description:
This was one of the first games I created, Was made during a 24 hour gamejam in 2012 with 3 other people, we won "Juiciest Game"!. The themes were Viking and Sheep, there are bugs mostly to do with collision and music so be warned.

Arrow keys to move and use 1,2,3 to use sheep to jump on, kill or advance. Sheep are unlocked as the player progresses.
